name: Adapt Framework Solutions
slogan: Innovation in secure data management and user authentication

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer/Wizard
jobs.description:
**Our culture**

Code is the necessary evil.  You write as little code as possible while solving the problem elegantly and sustainably.

Mediocre developers know how to use modern tools to solve boring problems.  You painstakingly identify the right problem and build the tools to solve it.  Mediocre developers think you're insane.  Five years later they pay big money to learn the tools you have created. 

You will not make a lot of money any time soon. You will be frustrated. You will be stuck for weeks. You will miss deadlines. You will wake up in the middle of the night realizing in cold sweat that you were wrong all along. You will argue till you're blue in the face. One day, your code will run on every device out there.  

**Senior software developer**
ADAPT FRAMEWORK SOLUTIONS is looking for two senior developers with 5+ years of project experience in some or all of the following areas:

* C++/Rust/Golang programming.
* Compilers, parsers, programming language design
* Functional programming, type systems, formal software verification
* High-performance storage and networking
* Database architecture and database theory
* Cryptography, secure enclave development, embedded development, secure software development
* Mobile development, secure application development in mobile environments

We are building a platform for programmable secure data containers used for critical data storage and management. To be part of this team, you have to be genuinely curious about innovation in computer technology and not afraid to learn new approaches, tools, and architectures. As this project is located on the intersection of many areas of computer science, you will be expected to fearlessly absorb new information on the on-going basis to cover areas as yet unfamiliar to you. Additionally, you have to know how to build software for agility and flexibly in the environment where requirements change swiftly and unexpectedly.

Special consideration given to those who possess additional experience, education, or interest in non-technical areas, such as psychology, social science, cognitive science, philosophy, linguistics, law, or similar. Working knowledge of mathematics, especially in applications to cryptography is also a plus.

Developers whose primary focus is on the web development stack **need not apply**. 

https://www.adaptframework.solutions
